original_text: Kish was an important man from the tribe of Benjamin. He was the son of Abiel. Abiel was the son of Zeror. Zeror was the son of Becorath. Becorath was the son of Aphiah. Aphiah was a descendant of Benjamin. Samuel 8 Samuel 10
korean_text: 베냐민 지파에 기스라 이름하는 유력한 사람이 있으니 그는 아비엘의 아들이요 스롤의 손자요 베고랏의 증손이요 아비아의 현손이며 베냐민 사람이더라

sentences.original_text: He was the son of Abiel
Abiel was the son of Zeror
Zeror was the son of Becorath
Becorath was the son of Aphiah
Aphiah was a descendant of Benjamin
